name: HL7FHIRNewZealandBaseImplementationGuide
title: HL7® FHIR® New Zealand Base Implementation Guide

resource.name: Building Name
resource.description: The name of a building cited in an address.

resource.name: ConditionOnPractice
resource.description: A full description of the conditions the health practitioner is subject to in relation to their scope of practice.

resource.name: District Health Board linked to a NZ Healthcare Service, Location or Patient
resource.description: District Health Board relating to a NZ Healthcare Service, Location (Facility) or Patient (primary, physical home address).

resource.name: NZ Domicile Code
resource.description: NZ Domicile Code. Derived from a patient's primary physical, home address.

resource.name: EDI Address
resource.description: Represents an Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) address. It is intended as an extension on ContactPoint.system, with the system value being 'other'.

resource.name: EducationalQualification
resource.description: Educational qualifications.

resource.name: Funded Healthcare Programme
resource.description: Funded NZ Healthcare Programmes

resource.name: Information Source
resource.description: The official source of information held about a patient.

resource.name: Long Term Condition Indicator
resource.description: Long Term Condition Indicator. A long term condition can be  defined as any ongoing, long term or recurring conditions that can have a significant impact on people’s lives.

resource.name: NZResidencyStatus
resource.description: NZ Residency Status

resource.name: NZ Citizenship
resource.description: New Zealand citizenship

resource.name: NZ Ethnicity
resource.description: The ethnicity of the patient. Level 4 codes preferred (most detailed).

resource.name: NZ Geocode
resource.description: New Zealand Geocode. This uses a different datum from that defined in the HL7 FHIR specification for a Geocode.

resource.name: NZePS Long Term Medication Indicator
resource.description: NZePS Long Term Medication Indicator

resource.name: NZePS Supply Period Reason
resource.description: The reason for a non-standard Supply Period.

resource.name: NZePS Unusual Dose Quantity Indicator
resource.description: NZePS Unusual Dose Quantity Indicator

resource.name: Primary Healthcare Organisation linked to a NZ Healthcare Service, Location or Patient
resource.description: Primary Healthcare Organisation associated with a General Practice linked to a NZ Healthcare Service, Location (Facility) or Patient (GP).

resource.name: RegistrationInitialDate
resource.description: The date the practitioner first became registered with the Responsible Authority or professional body

resource.name: RegistrationStatusCode
resource.description: An indicator of the practicing status of the practitioner as supplied by their Responsible Authority or professional body.

resource.name: ScopeOfPractice
resource.description: The type or range of health services a practitioner is authorized to perform, as determined by the Responsible Authority or professional body.

resource.name: Sex At Birth
resource.description: A person’s sex at the time of their birth (considered to be immutable).

resource.name: NZ Suburb
resource.description: Suburb element of a NZ Address.

resource.name: Citizenship status
resource.description: Citizenship status

resource.name: District Health Board Identifer
resource.description: District Health Board Identifer. Assigned by the HPI.

resource.name: domicileCode
resource.description: Domicile Code

resource.name: Ethnicity of a person
resource.description: Level 4 ethnicity codes

resource.name: Funded Programme
resource.description: Some sort of funded programme

resource.name: InformationSource
resource.description: The source from where the value of this item was sourced

resource.name: NZ Residency status
resource.description: Is the person a NZ resident

resource.name: PHO
resource.description: Primary Healthcare Organization

resource.name: Registration Status of Practitioners
resource.description: The code list represents the current practicing status of the Provider Person as per their registration with an RA.

resource.name: Scope of practice
resource.description: A coded type for professional scope of practice.

resource.name: Citizenship status
resource.description: Citizenship status

resource.name: District Health Board Code
resource.description: District Health Board Code

resource.name: domicileCode
resource.description: Domicile Code

resource.name: Level 4 ethnicity codes
resource.description: Level 4 ethnicity codes

resource.name: Funded Programme
resource.description: Some sort of funded programme

resource.name: InformationSource
resource.description: All possible sources of information

resource.name: NZ Residency status
resource.description: NZ Residency status

resource.name: PHO
resource.description: Primary Healthcare Organization

resource.name: Registration Status of Practitioners
resource.description: The code list represents the current practicing status of the Provider Person as per their registration with an RA.

resource.name: Scope of practice
resource.description: A classification of the type or range of health services that a practitioner is authorised to provide, as determined by the Responsible Authority or other statutory authority (e.g. PHARMAC), that is, what the practitioner can or cannot do. It includes Scope of Practice as defined by the Health Practitioners Competence Assurance Act 2003, any special authorisations granted, and any conditions or limitations imposed by the Responsible Authority.
